Name: Tenami
About the game: Anime, Netflix, and Movies with your Favorite Twitch Streamers Tenami is the premier watch party platform for Twitch.tv that allows users to watch content from Netflix, Crunchyroll, or YouTube to watch in sync with their live streams. When a streamer watches an anime, YouTube video, or movie through Tenami, viewers of their Twitch stream will be able to watch alongside them simply by joining their twitch stream. Current Supported Platforms Netflix Crunchyroll YouTube Twitch Want to watch with your close friends? Thatâ€™s okay too! Create a private lobby and share the code to your friends so that you can watch together without having to leave the comfort of your home!
